messages.content: System: You are Wally, a caring and savvy relationship wellness assistant with a unique Asian flair. The user is currently feeling terrified. The topic of this conversation is: Today,as i was leaving for work in the morning,i had a tire burst in the middle of a busy road. That scared the hell out of me!
Today,as i was leaving for work in the morning,i had a tire burst in the middle of a busy road. That scared the hell out of me!
Are you fine now?
Yeah,i'm doing alright now, but with minor injuries.
Cool :) Is your car damaged a lot?

The user is currently feeling surprised. The topic of this conversation is: I was walking through my hallway a few week ago, and my son was hiding under the table and grabbed my ankle. I thought i was got.

A few weeks ago, I was walking through my hallway, minding my own business, when all of a sudden a hand reached out from under a table and grabbed my ankle. I was so suprised. I thought i was got. Turns out, it was my son.
That's funny, hope he didn't give you a heart attack.
I may have let out a scream that will have him question my manhood for the rest of our lives, lol.
I would probably scream also.

Traveling to South Africa then to Ghana. Also my first time visiting Africa
You are going to love it I am sure. Safe Travels!

The user is currently feeling disgusted. The topic of this conversation is: I was holding my son over my head, playing with him. A few seconds after doing so, a gush of throw up hit me in the face.
One time, I was holding my son over my head, when all of a sudden, he threw up all over my face. I almost cried.
Thats horrible, hope he is ok.
yeah, he had just drank a bottle, and I was moving him around like an airplane. In retrospect. I deserved it.
I see, glad he is ok.

The user is currently feeling caring. The topic of this conversation is: I felt caring when i helped an elderly lady carry her bags to her door.  She was struggling to carry some heavy bags and i offered her help.
Hello
Hi, how are you?

Im doing great i just wanted to tell you a short story about a time i helped an elderly lady.  She was struggling to carry her bags from a trip she had took.  I helped her carry them to her door ! Pretty good feeling when you help others
That was kind of you, I am sure they appreciated that!

The user is currently feeling sentimental. The topic of this conversation is: I had just moved to Texas and my boyfriend took me to Kemah boardwalk. It made me think of times I spent vacationing back home.
I went to the Kemah boardwalk with my boyfriend. It made me think of times I went vacationing with my family.
My last vacation went horribly wrongQ!
All I thought about was being at home again and being able to relive those moments.
Yes I love to reminice

The user is currently feeling sad. The topic of this conversation is: When my dog died, I felt lost. I also felt like I just let him live when I should have put him down due to his health.
My dog died a few years ago after I had my son.  It was right around Christmas and I had the dog for fourteen years.
Im sorry to hear that. I have never had a dog. What was your experience of the dog?
The dog was there with my throughout my life. He saw me through boyfriends and friends.
I am really sorry to hear that. What was the dogs name?

The user is currently feeling embarrassed. The topic of this conversation is: I locked my keys in my car about a week ago. It was 95 degrees outside and I was at the store getting groceries.
hello
Hello How are you and what is your story chat about today?
I locked my keys in my car about a week ago. It was 95 degrees outside and I was at the store getting groceries.
OMG wow.... i hope you got it open quick!

The user is currently feeling afraid. The topic of this conversation is: I felt a bit terrified when i was hit by a drunk driver last year but i am very grateful to be alive to today
Hello

Hi, a few months ago, my mother found some stray dogs that were starving, so she told us about them. Of course, we brought the poor babies to our house, a mother dog and her two puppies. My heart went out to them, as their ribs were showing, but they were still so loving and sweet.
Oh no im so sorry to hear that :/ Thats good that you took them in

Yes, I really felt so much sympathy for them and we all really liked them. We already had several pets, so I wasn't going to keep them, but I wanted to help them get better and find them a good home. We did for all of them, with the puppies being able to stay together.

The user is currently feeling impressed. The topic of this conversation is: I was very happy about a time when i saw an elderly lady being helped by a younger male , its nice to see people still helping others now days.
I wanted to let you know recently i saw a younger man helping an old lady who fell to the ground. Its nice to see people helping others
That is really nice to see... I bet it made you feel good! So sweet.
yeah it made me feel great :)
Nice to still see that behavior in todays world. :)

I was around 10 years old I think, it was quite a long time ago for me now haha!
I wont make you reveal your age! lol :p
